page.title: 18Talke Social Club
page.content: In Talke Pits there is a Club called Talke Social Club.It is on the Coalpit Hill just opposite a carpark and is next to Hill Top Primary school. There are five rooms and each room as a games room and you can play darts,snooker and pool.On the landing there is a slot machine and space invaders machine.there is a very big room a stage and they have bands and singers that come to perform .There is a kitchen where they make pies,chips,peas,chicken-rolls,sallad-ba ps,hotdogs,hamburgers and pickled eggs. At the bars they sell crisps and all sorts of peanuts and chocolate bars as well as alcholic drinks.They have got two telephones,one is behind the bar and one is on the landing,and you have to pay for that one. }
